title: Pixel 3 stuck in logo mode after feb 2021 updates
content:
Feb 2021 updates were applied today and phone is stuck in boot mode at G logo.
Tried to reboot, launched recovery mode -> reboot device, restart bootloader but its stuck in fastmode mode.
Any help! I dont want to do factory reset.
Tried to use adb tools to apply jan 2021 update but laptop is not detecting the phone. I guess the required setting for adb to detect is not turned on the phone.
